conversations.conversation:
I am currently praying to get a particular rental house that is only a 5min walk from my job/my church, I currently walk for 45mins from my current home. This house would also have us only a few doors away from good friends.

If you are a christian, can you please pray for this to happen. There are many reasons why my child and I need to move from our current house, the distance from my job is only 1 of many.

Thanking You in advance.

MAY GOD BLESS YOU FOR ALL ETERNITY

Thank You for your prayers, I didn't get the first house but I did get another one on the same estate.
We are very happy in our new home.
Talk about moving horrors though. Does anyone want to exchange moving problems?
